dimensions.label: Humor Sense
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will appreciate subtle, dry wit and may not always catch on to sarcasm.
Your FarTwin will enjoy quick-witted banter and can often spot sarcasm or wordplay.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new experiences?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to play it safe and avoid taking unnecessary risks.
Your FarTwin will be more likely to take bold action and try new things, even if uncertain.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle showing emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions and may wear their heart on their sleeve.
Your FarTwin will tend to keep their emotions private and may struggle to open up about their feelings.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on rational analysis and evidence-based decision-making.
Your FarTwin may trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings or hunches.

dimensions.label: Social Etiquette
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle social norms?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adhere closely to established social rules and conventions.
Your FarTwin may be more flexible with social norms and expect others to be similar.

dimensions.label: Creativity Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin showcase their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will loudly express their artistic side and may dominate conversations with creative ideas.
Your FarTwin may prefer to express themselves creatively through written work, music, or other private pursuits.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin may become confrontational and argumentative when dealing with conflicts.
Your FarTwin will seek to find common ground and work towards a mutually beneficial solution.

dimensions.label: Self-Awareness
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin understand their own motivations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will have a strong sense of self-awareness and can identify their own strengths, weaknesses, and biases.
Your FarTwin may struggle to understand their own motivations and may act on instinct without much introspection.
